summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeLanolips The Original 101 Ointment Multipurpose Superbalm is a multi-award-winning, natural lip balm that locks hydration with the world's best lanolin.
details: DetailsBenefitsApply it to your lips every night and wake up to supple lips as it provides hydration to dry lips.Apply it during the day as your daily lip balm or use it as a base before applying your lip color as it locks in moisture.As its name suggests, it has many uses beyond just lips.101 Uses include: Apply to dry cuticles/cracked heels/dry nasal passages. Melt it into your own moisturizer to supercharge. Mix a tiny bit with your foundation for a natural, dewy look. Keep eyebrows in place. Apply to windburn/cold-chapped cheeks. Heal dry/brittle nails, paper cuts, insect bites.Alleviate dryness associated with psoriasis.Mix with hydrocortisone to alleviate eczema.FeaturesThe Ultimate Dry Skin TreatmentMulti-Award Winning - Won InStyle Best Lip Balm, Nominated for Vogue Beauty Award and Refinery 29 Editors PickFemale-Owned Beauty BrandNew Mom Friendly - Safe enough for newborn babiesSoothes and protects sore breastfeeding nipplesWill hydrate extremely dry, cracked newborn skinTSA-Approved, travel friendly beauty productDermatologically TestedCruelty-FreeCertified by Leaping BunnyVegetarian100% NaturalTop Dermatologists say the following:"This works for so many different skincare concerns - from dry, chapped lips and cuticles to burns, eczema, and beyond.""It really is a wonder ingredient for hydration and healing alike.""This lip balm can hold 200 percent its weight in moisture and is formulated with the brand's proprietary lanolin, which is three times purer than medical-grade lanolin.""Regular, and even occasional use will quickly heal and plump dry, thinning lips."Formulated WithoutArtificial ColorsFragrancesParabensPthalatesPetrolatumPEGsMineral OilItem 2549502How To UseWarm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously.Precautions: For external use only.IngredientsLanolin* *naturally derived/*Dérivé naturellement.
how_to_use: Warm the ointment between the fingers or apply directly onto the lips & skin. Use generously.Precautions: For external use only.

reviews.headline: Extremely hydrating and long lasting
reviews.comments: If you have severely dry/chapped lips, this is for you. It's very thick and stays on for a long time. It also leaves a nice shine so it doubles as a lip gloss!

reviews.headline: Very Good!
reviews.comments: This ointment does what you want for your chapped lips and more. It works great on my cuticles, and I even used it on two small dry spots on my knees. They are all soft and with consistent use I hope they will stay that way. Very pleased!

reviews.headline: Perfect for Everything
reviews.comments: I love this superbalm so much! It's great for chapped lips, moisturizing skin, covering little cuts or hangnails, and even helping my breastfeeding journey! Nothing moisturizes me quite like this does. The scented lip balms they have are so much fun too.

reviews.headline: Better than most lip treatments
reviews.comments: I bought this after first trying a free sample. The little I got in the sample impressed me, but after using it regularly for a couple of weeks, I'd say it's better than most lip treatments but not as great as I'd hoped. I live in a dry climate and am constantly battling chapped lips. This does make my lips feel better but it doesn't last as long as I'd like.

reviews.headline: Maybe buy
reviews.comments: I've tried a lot of lip balms over the years, but Lanolips has a way of making my lips feel actually repaired, not just coated. The texture is thick but not sticky, so it creates a protective layer that stays put even through coffee sips and talking all day. I love that the formula is made with pure lanolin — it mimics the skin's natural oils, so it sinks in instead of just sitting on top. I've used it on cracked lips, dry cuticles, and even a flaky patch on my nose after a cold, and it works like magic every time. A tiny bit goes a long way, so the tube lasts forever. The only "problem" is that now my other lip balms feel like water in comparison.

reviews.headline: Versatile
reviews.comments: This balm is super versatile. It can be used as a lip balm or a healing balm. I use it to keep my lips moisturized. I also use it to heal cuts and smooth dry skin. It soothes the area and also heals it.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: I got this for a friend's birthday, and got to try it myself. It's incredibly moisturizing and high quality.

reviews.headline: Superb Product
reviews.comments: The Lanolips Original has been my best product find this year. My lips were terrible all winter and early spring until I asked about a product in the Ulta store for dry lips and the sales associate gave me Lanolips to try.I have purchased 3  times.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: This ointment is so healing and hydrating.  The small tube is perfect for taking on the go.  My favorite uses are on my lips, my dry, cracked heals, and my cuticles.

reviews.headline: Get it!!
reviews.comments: You need it

reviews.headline: love this
reviews.comments: I love that this can have multi-use! Hydrates my lips very well and I use it in other areas when ever I need need.

reviews.headline: Unimpressed
reviews.comments: For the price of this small bottle, it is basically a thick vaseline. not impressed. Will not be purchasing again.

reviews.headline: Does a decent job
reviews.comments: When opening up the tube to apply to my lips, I instantly smelled coconut. I am not a huge fan of coconut, but I am not like my sister she would not use it. My elbows I noticed were dry, like my lips, and decided to apply some of the balm to them.  I learned you are allowed to use the balm not just on your lips but in other areas where you have cracked skin. I liked the texture more on my elbows, than my lips because I felt it was on the greasy side and didn't care for the coconut scent to be right underneath my nose.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: Lips, cuticles, arms, skin, this is the best for everything i love it.

reviews.headline: So moisturizing
reviews.comments: Love have a simple do everything miracle product!

reviews.headline: Love as an overnight mask
reviews.comments: When I put this on my lips at night there's still product on my lips in the morning!! Its super hydrating but can turn white, so I only use it as an overnight lip mask

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: This balm is a must-have in my bag — it's rich, glossy, and insanely hydrating without feeling sticky. I use it on my lips, cuticles, even on dry patches, and it works like magic every single time. A little goes a long way, and the results are immediate. It gives my lips that healthy, plump look while keeping them soft all day. Total game changer!

reviews.headline: Perfect for any dry spot
reviews.comments: I apply this mostly on my lips but have applied it to my finger tips and knees or even around the nose when i need a little extra hydration.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Love love love this balm. Its so good. I apply it to my cuticles, my heels and my elbows. Perfect for the lips too! Its super hydrating and absorbs quickly into the skin.

reviews.headline: Must have in my purse
reviews.comments: I tried this amazing product a few days ago and let me tell you it's amazing. It moisturizes my lips amazingly and leaves them glowing.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have never found a product quite as moisturising as Lano 101 Ointment! Before I discovered the product, my lips were constantly dry and flakey. Nothing I ever used was able to permanently fix the condition of my lips, until i found 101 Ointment! It is unscented, pure Lanolin, I put on a thick layer before going to sleep each night, and wake up with soft supple lips every single day! It's also the perfect base for lipsticks. Seriously my desert island product! Can't wait to try more from the range
faceoff_positive.headline: The absolute BEST product for hydrating lips!

faceoff_negative.comments: Buy a tube a lanolin for $7 in the baby aisle! This is so overpriced it's ridiculous! This is nothing more special than regular lanolin. It does work decent so hence the two stars, but it's not the super balm they claim it to be. It wears off easily and tastes kinda bad, but that's why no one likes using lanolin. So not worth the money.
faceoff_negative.headline: Totally overpriced
